cab.content: ;aB;A/;c^This Document is the Property ofHis Hritannic Majesty^ Government.)OPERATIONS .SECRET.1 (From General Flume r, Italy. To C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in at 8.40 p.m. 4.12.17. Received at 4.30 a.m. 5.12.17.0.34.Enemy yesterday made strong attacks on Agiago Plateau but all were repulsed with exception of one advanced point.Commander of 1st Army is satisfied with the situation.I visited Army and Corps Commanders of the 3rd Army to-day who hold the line of the Piave. Much pro-gress has certainly been made with the defence and they are all confident of holding their own.We have taken over the Montello sector.
